insert into five_budget_independent (business_key, form_no, dept_id, dept_name, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_process_end, process_instance_id, budget_total_money, title, budget_year ) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{budgetTotalMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{budgetYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select id, business_key, form_no, dept_id, dept_name, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_process_end, process_instance_id, budget_total_money, title, budget_year from five_budget_independent where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
